(Simplified: 鳊)
Chinese Definition:
①(鯿魚)體側扁，略呈菱形，生活在淡水中，爲重要經濟魚類之一。亦稱“長春鯿”、“北京鯿”。

鯿字的基本解释

鯿
biān
见“鳊”。

鯿字的汉语字典释义

[①]［biān］
［《廣韻》卑連切，平仙，幫。］
［《廣韻》布還切，平删，幫。］
亦作“鯾1”。“鳊1”的繁体字。
鱼名。鳊鱼。古亦称鲂。鱼纲鲤科。身体侧扁，头小而尖，鳞较细。生活在淡水中。肉味鲜美。

鯿字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【魚字部】　鯿； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1474第08
【說文】同鯾。【爾雅·釋魚註】江東呼魴魚爲鯿。【宋玉·釣賦】思不出乎鮒鯿。【後漢·馬融傳】魴鱮鱏鯿。【註】鯿，魴之類也。襄陽耆舊傳：漢中鯿魚甚美，常禁人捕，以槎斷水，因謂之槎頭縮項鯿。又【劉弇詩】歸釣潭頭楓葉鯿。又【廣韻】布還切，音斑。又【集韻】逋閑切，音斒。義?同。

Bream
Basic explanation of words
Bream
biān
See "bream".
Bream
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［biān］
["Guangyun" Peilianqie, Pingxian, help. ]
["Guangyun" cloth still cut, flat cut, help. ]
Also known as "鯾1". Traditional characters for "鳊1".
The name of the fish. Bream. Ancient also known as bream. Fish class Cyprinidae. The body is flat on the side, the head is small and pointed, and the scales are finer. Live in fresh water. The meat is delicious.
Bream
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Hai Collection】【Fish Character Department】　鳊; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 1474 Page 08
[Said the text] the same as Lu. [Erya·Shiyu Note] Jiangdong Hu bream is a bream. [Song Yu·Diao Fu] Can't think of bream. [Later Han·Ma Rong Biography] bream bream. [Note] Bream, bream and the like are also. The old biography of Xiangyang Qi: Hanzhong bream is very beautiful, and people are often prohibited from catching it. And 【Liu Bian Poem】Go to fish for the maple bream of Tantou. [Guang Yun] The cloth is still cut, the sound spots. Also 【Jiyun】Cut leisurely, sound mellow. Righteous? Same.
